title: # 391 - Marc Maron & ME
description:
Today I sit down in the man cave with Marc Maron. We talk about LSD, guitars, music, who Marc looks up to, our different fan bases, his most memorable podcasts, and much more! 

Marc's New Special "End Times Fun" is streaming right now on Netflix! 

This episode is brought to you by Blue Apron. Get $60 off at www.blueapron.com/Bertcast

This episode is also brought to you by Whoop. Get 15% off your membership at www.whoop.com by using the promo code “BERT” at checkout

In just a few minutes you can find your best price and apply at www.Policygenius.com

The Berty Boy Tour is on sale now! Get your tickets at www.bertbertbert.com 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: www.bertbertbert.com 

Twitter: www.Twitter.com/bertkreischer  

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/BertKreischer  

Instagram: www.Instagram.com/bertkreischer 

Youtube: www.Youtube.com/user/Akreischer
